Class ec.ifc.stonelook.SLButtonBorder 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.Border
           |
           +----ec.ifc.stonelook.SLButtonBorder
class SLButtonBorder
extends Border
Button border used for the stone-texture look. SLButton.createPushButton uses this automatically, so this class shouldn't need to be made public.
See Also:
createPushButton

This class is not public and can therefore cannot be used outside this package.
